job_details.experience_required: 10 years, with minimum of 5 years in Business analysis

jd: From: Rakesh, Blue Ocean Ventures rakesh.d@blue-oceanventures.com Reply to: rakesh.d@blue-oceanventures.com Hi,Role : Health Edge Technical ConsultantRemote Overall 10 years of experience in IT with minimum of 5 years of Business analysis experience in Healthcare domain such as a managed care organization commercial health insurance plans providers Care Knowledge of clinical and provider systems is beneficialMandatory work experience in Health EdgeExperience with SDLC methodologies best practices standards for creating User Stories Business Requirements Documents and Change RequestsExperience with any Testing Tools such as HP ALM JIRA or Bucket etcMust be able to able to create user stories and business requirements that are precise not ambiguous testable traceable and foremost in line with the high level vision scope of the projectAbility to multitask and prioritize day to day tasks as well as milestones that require focus on deliverables extensive testing on site client workshopsAbility to pay attention to details clearly define business need and solution approach standard configuration workaround or custom enhancement.Data driven analysis SQL skills and or experience with any of data visualization tools like tableau QlikView powerBI
